channel.title: Problem with variables [rep++] for help!
channel.description:
Okay...i just made a minigame and for some reason whenever i compile it it comes up with this:
.\client.java:20926: cannot find symbol symbol : variable InHS location: class client InHS = true; ^ .\client.java:20935: cannot find symbol symbol : variable InHS location: class client if(PlayerHandler.hsnpc == 1 && InHS && PlayerHandler.npchs == 1){ ^ .\client.java:20936: cannot find symbol symbol : variable InHS location: class client InHS = false; ^ 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .
Any help??

item.title: Problem with variables [rep++] for help!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Yeah i did that and it still wont work - its not finding it =[

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with variables [rep++] for help!
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

I read the tutorial you used, and posted on it. Check out the topic.
Copy and paste this underneath a void:

public boolean isInHS() { if((absX >= 2366 && absX <= 2433 && absY >= 3070 && absY <= 3137)) return true; else return false; }

[quote=“ServerMuncher, post:4, topic:352361”]Surely you would know, if you actually read the tutorial/coded the minigame yourself? O_o[/quote]That wasn’t neccessary

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with variables [rep++] for help!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Okay…i just made a minigame and for some reason whenever i compile it it comes up with this:

.\client.java:20926: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable InHS
location: class client
InHS = true;
^
.\client.java:20935: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable InHS
location: class client
if(PlayerHandler.hsnpc == 1 && InHS && PlayerHandler.npchs == 1){
^
.\client.java:20936: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable InHS
location: class client
InHS = false;
^
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

Any help??

Read full topic
